title: question about typecon 2005
content:
The typecon website states  
"optional workshops: $100 for each full-day session and $50 for each half-day session, plus materials fees if any"

Maybe I am blind but I cannot seem to find information about them on the typecon site. Does anyone have a link to these workshops? I even signed up for the newsletter and not received any information about them. (is it just too early for a schedule?)
author: emel

comments.content: The typecon site will be going live very, very soon and you will be with the rest of the masses that wish to pounce and are anxiously waiting with baited breath for the detailed listing of speakers and workshops.
